name: Voting Simulator 2K16
description:
You play as: Average Voter, a Tasmanian voter who has drunk contaminated water from a ballot paper printing factory. From this you have gained superpowers that allow you to influence the voting habits of Tasmanian Voters. You are hired by The Greens to ensure they have political domination in Tasmania.

Characters and Background: Ali Johnston

Graphics and Sound: Lewis Ottaway

Programming: Oliver Vogel-Reed
